医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型药物组合有望治疗肾移植受者的晚期皮肤癌接受过肾移植的人患皮肤癌的风险很高。由约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心的研究人员领导的新研究正在探索针对皮肤癌同时保留移植器官的最佳治疗组合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Novel-drug-combination-shows-promise-for-treating-advanced-skin-cancers-in-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Novel-drug-combination-shows-promise-for-treating-advanced-skin-cancers-in-kidney-transplant-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aa2d0c1-c584-4032-93f4-c45b6f9c8877 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 13:07:49 -0500 Novel drug combination shows promise for treating advanced skin cancers in kidney transplant recipients
研究强调了老年女性久坐行为与死亡风险增加之间的联系根据对百岁老人数十年的观察，作者 Dan Buettner（《蓝色地带》）推测，人们在坐 20 分钟后站起来走动时，寿命会更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Research-highlights-link- Between-sedentary-behavior-and-increased-mortality-risk-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Research-highlights-link- Between-sedentary-behavior-and-increased-mortality-risk-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8610a67-feb5-474e-b757-b71708dbf410 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:54:25 -0500 Research highlights link between sedentary behavior and increased mortality risk in older women
研究发现钙晶体沉积物与膝骨关节炎恶化有关膝骨关节炎 (OA) 是最常见的关节炎形式，影响全球约 6 亿人和美国 3,400 万人https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Calcium-crystal-deposits-linked-to-worsening-knee-osteoarthritis-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Calcium-crystal-deposits-linked-to-worsening-knee-osteoarthritis-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7f6938f-67f8-48d8-8218-e3aea3eab0be Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:50:36 -0500 Calcium crystal deposits linked to worsening knee osteoarthritis, study finds
抗癌药物有望治疗中风后脑损伤阿拉巴马大学神经科学研究所 (INc-UAB) 的一项研究在动物模型中证明了伏立诺他对中风后的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Anti-cancer-drug-shows-promise-in-treating-brain-injuries-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Anti-cancer-drug-shows-promise-in-treating-brain-injuries-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f21f542-fe92-4d9a-85a6-3d1c55ef98ac Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:35:57 -0500 Anti-cancer drug shows promise in treating brain injuries after stroke
研究性蛋白质替代品可保护新生小鼠免受致命肠道疾病的侵害芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院 Stanley Manne 儿童研究所的科学家及其同事发现，一种研究性蛋白质替代品——重组人胰岛素样生长因子 1 及其结合蛋白 3 (rhIGF-1/BP3)——受到保护新生小鼠死于坏死性小肠结肠炎（NEC），这是一种致命的肠道疾病，经常袭击极早产儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Investigational- Protein-replacement-protects-neonatal-mice-from-deadly-intestinal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Investigational- Protein-replacement-protects-neonatal-mice-from-deadly-intestinal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9252c0c4-a78e-4729-b686-68a296ceaad4 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:30:15 -0500 Investigational protein replacement protects neonatal mice from deadly intestinal disease
内分泌学会敦促国会支持保护体外受精机会的立法内分泌学会呼吁国会议员支持保护体外受精 (IVF) 的联邦立法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Endocrine-Society-urges-Congress-to-support-legislation-protecting-access-to-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Endocrine-Society-urges-Congress-to-support-legislation-protecting-access-to-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7155446-2474-474a-84d9-6d96383a21ed Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:27:24 -0500 Endocrine Society urges Congress to support legislation protecting access to IVF
AGA 发布关于美国 IBD 护理未来的白皮书今天，美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 发布了一份关于美国炎症性肠病 (IBD) 护理未来的白皮书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AGA-publishes-white-paper-on-the-future-of-IBD-care-in-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AGA-publishes-white-paper-on-the-future-of-IBD-care-in-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe417046-9c10-4dd5-8b98-c45111fae2f2 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:23:00 -0500 AGA publishes white paper on the future of IBD care in the United States
AHA 科学声明：心血管医学人工智能应用的进展和挑战人工智能 (AI) 可能会改变心血管医学。不过，根据美国心脏协会今天在该协会的旗舰同行评审期刊《Circulation》上发表的一份新的科学声明，目前仍然存在许多挑战，而且很少有人工智能工具被证明可以改善护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AHA-scientific-statement-Advances-and-challenges-in-AI-applications-for-cardioangio-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/AHA-scientific-statement-Advances-and-challenges-in-AI-applications-for-cardioangio-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aba26a1a-76e9-415a-94f8-3151821bbb71 Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:20:37 -0500 AHA scientific statement: Advances and challenges in AI applications for cardiovascular medicine
Bio-Hermes 数据揭示了血液生物标志物与阿尔茨海默病淀粉样斑块之间的密切相关性全球阿尔茨海默病平台基金会 (GAP) 正在发布 Bio-Hermes-001 研究的第一个结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Bio-Hermes-data-reveals-strong-correlation- Between-blood-biomarkers-and-Alzheimers-amyloid-plaques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Bio-Hermes-data-reveals-strong-correlation- Between-blood-biomarkers-and-Alzheimers-amyloid-plaques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162241e0-45ec-4194-86a2-4d5f881c7eff Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:14:52 -0500 Bio-Hermes data reveals strong correlation between blood biomarkers and Alzheimer's amyloid plaques
新型“立方体中的组织”模型模拟血脑屏障进行药物测试日本理化学研究所生物系统动力学研究中心（BDR）的一个研究小组利用源自人体细胞的模块化组织成功建立了血脑屏障模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Novel-Tissue-in-a-CUBE-model-mimics-blood-brain-barrier-for-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240228/Novel-Tissue-in-a-CUBE-model-mimics-blood-brain-barrier-for-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baf79965-26b1-4076-a7eb-6e9277dd105c Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:09:05 -0500 Novel "Tissue-in-a-CUBE" model mimics blood-brain barrier for drug testing
